options.text: Please follow the CloudGuard Network for Azure VMSS Gateway Load Balancer R81.10 and Higher Administration Guide.

basics.name: gatewayScaleSetNameUi
basics.label: Gateway scale set name
basics.toolTip: The name of the Check Point Security Gateway Scale Set.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the name must be 1-30 characters long.

toolTip.sshPublicKey: Paste an OpenSSH public key. You can generate a key pair using ssh-keygen (Linux, OS X, Cygwin) or PuttyGen (Windows)

elements.name: upgrading
elements.label: Are you upgrading your CloudGuard VMSS solution?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' if you are upgrading your CloudGuard VMSS solution.

options.text:
All the configurations below must be similar to the existing CloudGuard VMSS solution.

Note that the target load balancers are the ones connected to your existing CloudGuard VMSS solution.

See the Deployment Guide for more information.

elements.name: vmCount
elements.label: Initial number of gateways
elements.toolTip: The initial number of gateways

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a number in the range 1-99.

elements.name: maxVmCount
elements.label: Maximum number of gateways
elements.toolTip: The maximum number of gateways

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a number in the range 1-99.

options.text: Maximum number of gateways is lower than initial number of gateways

elements.name: managementServer
elements.label: Management name
elements.toolTip: The name of the management server as it appears in the configuration file

constraints.validationMessage: Field cannot be empty. Only alphanumeric characters or '_'/'-' are allowed, and the name must be 1-30 characters long.

options.text: Use a different configuration template name than in your existing CloudGuard VMSS solution.

elements.name: configurationTemplate
elements.label: Configuration template name
elements.toolTip: The configuration template name as it appears in the configuration file

constraints.validationMessage: Field cannot be empty. Only alphanumeric characters or '_'/'-' are allowed, and the name must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: adminEmail
elements.label: Administrator email address
elements.toolTip: An email address to notify about scaling operations

constraints.validationMessage: Leave empty or enter a valid email address.

elements.name: appLoadDistribution
elements.label: Gateway Load Balancer session persistence
elements.toolTip: The load balancing distribution method for the Gateway Load Balancer.

elements.name: instanceLevelPublicIP
elements.label: Deploy the VMSS with instance level Public IP address
elements.toolTip: If selected 'Yes', then each VMSS instance will have its own public IP address.

elements.name: lbsTargetRGName
elements.label: Target load balancers resource group name
elements.toolTip: The name of the Target Load Balancers Resource Group.

constraints.validationMessage: Resource Group only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens, slash, and parenthesis

elements.name: lbResourceId
elements.label: Target gateway load balancer resource ID
elements.toolTip: The Resource ID of the Target Gateway Load Balancer.

constraints.validationMessage: Resource Id only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens, slash, and parenthesis

options.text: Make sure you have created a new backend address pool for the target gateway load balancer.

elements.name: lbTargetBEAddressPoolName
elements.label: Gateway load balancer's new backend pool name
elements.toolTip: The name of the new Target Gateway Load Balancer's Backend Pool.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens, slash, and parenthesis are allowed

elements.name: mgmtInterfaceOpt1
elements.label: Management interface and IP address
elements.toolTip: Manage the Gateways in the Scale Set via the instance's external (eth0) or internal (eth1) NIC and with public or private IP.

elements.name: mgmtIPaddress
elements.label: Management Server IP address
elements.toolTip: The IP address used to manage the VMSS instances.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid IP address

elements.name: availabilityZonesNum
elements.label: Number of Availability Zones to use
elements.toolTip: The number of avalability zones to use for the scale set. Note that the load balancers and their IP addresses will be zone redundant in any case.
elements.visible: [contains(' australiaeast brazilsouth canadacentral centralus eastasia eastus eastus2 francecentral germanywestcentral japaneast koreacentral northeurope norwayeast southafricanorth southcentralus southeastasia swedencentral uksouth usgovvirginia westeurope westus2 westus3 switzerlandnorth qatarcentral centralindia uaenorth ', concat(' ', location(), ' '))]

elements.name: customMetrics
elements.label: Enable CloudGuard metrics
elements.toolTip: Enable CloudGuard metrics in order to send statuses and statistics collected from VMSS instances to the Azure Monitor service.

elements.name: cloudGuardVersion
elements.label: Check Point CloudGuard version
elements.toolTip: The version of Check Point CloudGuard.

elements.name: R80Offer
elements.label: License type
elements.toolTip: The type of license.

elements.name: R8110vmSizeUiBYOL
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: R8110vmSizeUiNGTP
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: R8110vmSizeUiNGTX
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: R8120vmSizeUiBYOL
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: R8120vmSizeUiNGTP
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: R8120vmSizeUiNGTX
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The VM size of the Security Gateway

elements.name: adminShell
elements.label: Default shell for the admin user
elements.toolTip: The default shell for the admin user

elements.name: sicKeyUi
elements.toolTip: Set the Secure Internal Communication one time secret used to set up trust between the gateway and the management server.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 12-30 characters long.

options.text: Check Point recommends setting serial console password and maintenance-mode password for recovery purposes.      For R81.10 and below the serial console password is used also as maintenance-mode password

elements.name: EnableSerialConsolePassword
elements.label: Enable Serial console password
elements.toolTip: A unique password hash to enable VM connection via serial console.

elements.name: AdditionalPassword
elements.toolTip: Serial console password hash, used to enable password authentication (using serial console). To generate password hash use the command 'openssl passwd -6 PASSWORD'

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be the output of the hash command.

options.text: Check Point recommends setting a maintenance-mode password for recovery purposes.

elements.name: EnableMaintenanceMode
elements.label: Enable Maintenance Mode
elements.toolTip: A unique password hash to enable VM maintenance mode.

elements.name: MaintenanceModePassword
elements.toolTip: To generate a password hash use the command 'grub2-mkpasswd-pbkdf2' on Linux and paste it here.

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be the output of the hash command.

elements.name: bootstrapScript
elements.label: Bootstrap script
elements.toolTip: An optional script to run on the initial boot

elements.name: allowUploadDownload
elements.label: Automatically download updates and share statistical data for product improvement purpose
elements.toolTip: Automatically download Blade Contracts and other important data. Improve product experience by sending data to Check Point

elements.name: VMDiskType
elements.label: VM disk type
elements.toolTip: Type of CloudGuard disk.

elements.name: VMDiskTypeOldVersions
elements.label: VM disk type
elements.toolTip: Type of CloudGuard disk.

elements.name: useCustomImageUri
elements.label: Use development image uri
elements.toolTip: Use custom image URI.

elements.name: sourceImageVhdUri
elements.label: Development Image URI
elements.toolTip: The URI of the blob containing the development image

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters and '_','-','.',':','/' are allowed, the value must be 1-500 characters long and must end with .vhd.

elements.name: NSG
elements.label: Network Security Group
elements.toolTip: Choose between using an existing NSG or using a new NSG

elements.name: nsgSelector
elements.label: Network Security Group
elements.toolTip: Choose an existing NSG

elements.name: NSGName
elements.label: Name
elements.toolTip: Insert Name for the new NSG

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the name must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: tagsByResource
elements.toolTip: Create Azure tags for the new resources
